title: Lost Relic
loreText: A faint energy signature pulses from this location. Could it be a relic from the old world?

title: Strange Signal
loreText: Your scanner picked up a strange encrypted signal originating from here.

title: Supply Cache
loreText: Old records indicate a supply drop was left in this area long ago.

title: Mysterious Anomaly
loreText: The laws of physics seem to bend slightly around this specific coordinate.

title: Forgotten Shrine
loreText: Locals whisper of a shrine hidden in plain sight, waiting for a worthy traveler.

title: Time Rift
loreText: Reality seems unstable here. Witnesses report seeing glimpses of the past and future bleeding together.

title: Meteor Impact Site
loreText: A small meteorite crashed here decades ago. Locals say it still glows at night with an otherworldly light.

title: Phantom Broadcast
loreText: An old radio station that was never registered continues to broadcast music from this exact spot.

title: Underground Network
loreText: Your equipment detects an extensive tunnel system beneath this location. Origins unknown.

title: Digital Ghost
loreText: A mysterious AI fragment has been detected in the wireless networks around this area.

title: Wildlife Tracker
loreText: A rare species has been sighted in this area. Document their presence for the conservation database.

title: Magnetic Anomaly
loreText: Compasses spin wildly near this point. Something beneath the surface is affecting the magnetic field.

title: Ancient Portal
loreText: Stone markers arranged in a perfect circle suggest this was once a ceremonial gateway.

title: Neon Shadow
loreText: Urban explorers report a figure of pure light that appears only in the shadows of neon signs.

title: Weather Nexus
loreText: Meteorologists can't explain why storm patterns always seem to center around this location.

title: Memory Echo
loreText: People passing through here often report vivid memories of events they never experienced.

title: Quantum Entanglement
loreText: Particles at this location appear to be entangled with somewhere far across the universe.

title: Healing Spring
loreText: Water from this underground spring is said to have remarkable restorative properties.

title: Graffiti Prophecy
loreText: Street art here depicts events that haven't happened yet. Each painting comes true eventually.

title: Sound Sculpture
loreText: Architecture and geography combine to create hauntingly beautiful natural acoustics at this spot.

title: Lost Library Entrance
loreText: Old maps suggest a vast underground library lies beneath this seemingly ordinary location.

title: Energy Vortex
loreText: Spiritual practitioners claim this is a convergence point of the planet's natural energy lines.

title: Satellite Debris
loreText: A piece of decommissioned satellite technology landed here, still transmitting encrypted data.

title: Bioluminescent Colony
loreText: A rare species of glowing fungus has been discovered here, unlike anything in the scientific record.

title: Pirate's Cache
loreText: Legend says a notorious smuggler buried treasure here before vanishing without a trace.
